code: import _classCallCheck from"/home/durjoy/Projects/dynamicSite/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/classCallCheck";import axios from'axios';var RestClient=function RestClient(){_classCallCheck(this,RestClient);};RestClient.GetRequest=function(getUrl){return axios.get(getUrl).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(error){return null;});};RestClient.PostRequest=function(postUrl,postJson){var config={headers:{'Content-Type':'application/x-www-form-urlencoded'}};return axios.post(postUrl,postJson,config).then(function(response){return response.data;}).catch(function(error){return null;});};export default RestClient;
